title: Trump's Playbook To Gut The Department of Education
description: President Trump vowed to eliminate the Education Department, and he’s used every tool at his disposal to get that done. Reporter Liam Knox walks host David Gura through his strategy on today’s Big Take podcast.  (Source: Bloomberg)
content: President Trump vowed to eliminate the Education Department, and he’s used every tool at his disposal to get that done. Reporter Liam Knox walks host David Gura through his strategy on today’s Big Take podcast.  (Source: Bloomberg)
